name: StainsRemoval
0:
”Alexa, open Stains Removal”
”Alexa, play Stains Removal”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stains removal
des: Stains Removal is a skill that gives you helpful hints to remove stains and spots from your clothes.This skill has several categories.There is beetroot, blood, chocolate, chewing gum, coffee, fruit, grass, ink, lipstick, paint, perspiration, rust, wine, and yellowed clothing. To hear a helpful tip to remove a stain or spot just say that specific word.For example, if you have a grass stain, just say grass. If there is another stain that you have, and I haven't got a solution here, then please rate this skill appropriately, and leave a comment and I'll see if I can help you.
